title: Customer Care - Intern
jd: Assist in responding to customer inquiries via email, phone, or chat.
Help resolve customer issues and complaints professionally.
Maintain customer records and document interactions.
Support the customer care team with administrative tasks.
Ensure customer satisfaction by providing prompt and helpful responses.
requirements: Currently pursuing or recently graduated with a degree in Business, Communications, or a related field.
Ability to work independently and in a team.

title: Marketing - Intern
jd: Assist the Brand Manager with marketing tasks and project coordination.
Support in the planning and execution of events and promotions.
Help with market research and competitor analysis.
Contribute to content creation for marketing materials.
Coordinate with different teams to ensure smooth implementation of marketing activities.
Assist in tracking marketing performance and organizing marketing reports.
requirements: Currently pursuing or recently graduated with a degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.
Good communication skills and attention to detail.
Ability to work both independently and as part of a team.
